title: Marketing Generative AI Specialist, Acquisitions, Ads Marketing
description: As a Creative in Marketing, you bring visual, design, written and experiential acumen to Google products and services, presented across all major media, content, channels, and experiences. You have the ability to perform your role in a flexible, ever-changing environment and must be open to new influences and inspiration...
key_qualifications:
Experience in project management.
Experience with AI products, technologies, and infrastructure.
Experience with Large Language Models (LLMs) (e.g., prompt engineering solutioning using APIs).
preferred_qualifications:
Experience in Marketing.
Ability to design, develop, and manage dynamic Cloud solutions.
Ability to learn, understand, and work with emerging technologies, methodologies, and Cloud-based solutions.
Excellent attention to detail skills.
responsibilities:
Launch and measure AI powered experiments across our marketing channels (e.g., paid media, scaled communications, web) to acquire thousands of advertisers each year, creating efficient and effective user journeys to increase customer acquisitions, product adoption, and overall business...
...
